subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Less than 24 hours after Hakeem Nicks, a former Giants receiver, agreed to a one-year deal with the Indianapolis Colts, he said he was so confident in his skills that it was an easy decision.
snippet: Less than 24 hours after Hakeem Nicks, a former Giants receiver, agreed to a one-year deal with the Indianapolis Colts, he said he was so confident in his skills that it was an easy decision.
